name: The fan the vase and the cat
name_original: The fan the vase and the cat
description:
A game developed for 2 buttoms jam 2021.

The only 2 buttons to control the game are the left arrow and the right arrow.

You control the fan wind and you must avoid that the cat from throwing the vase on the floor .

you must play the whole game to fully enjoy it, it lasts less than 2 minutes so hope you like it.

developed by Facundo Bernardo.

by the way this is my first game and my first jam, thanks for try my game.
